home.hero_subtitle: AI creates a personalized travel plan with map and professional PDF
home.hero_description: Save hours of research. Get a complete itinerary tailored to your preferences, budget, and schedule.
home.how_subtitle: Three simple steps to your dream journey
home.step1_desc: Tell AI where you want to go, for how many days, your budget, and what interests you. The more details, the better the plan.
home.step2_desc: In seconds, AI analyzes thousands of options and creates a personalized itinerary with attractions, restaurants, and practical tips.
home.step3_desc: Export your ready plan with map to a professional PDF. Have everything at hand offline during your trip.
home.features_subtitle: The best AI travel planning tool
home.feature1_desc: Visualize your entire route on a map. See all points in one place, check distances, and optimize the order of attractions.
home.feature2_desc: Download a beautifully designed PDF with your plan and map. Perfect for printing or offline travel.
home.feature3_desc: Instead of spending days browsing blogs and forums, get a ready plan in 5 minutes. AI does the research for you.
home.feature4_desc: Set how much you want to spend, and AI will suggest options within your budget - from economical to luxury.
home.feature5_desc: Every plan is unique. AI analyzes your preferences, travel style, and creates an itinerary perfect for you.
home.feature6_desc: Don't like something in the plan? Edit, add, or remove points. Full control over your journey.
home.comparison_subtitle: See how much AI can make your life easier
home.ai_2: AI chooses the best options for you
home.ai_6: More time to enjoy your trip
home.stats_subtitle: Join users who saved hundreds of hours planning
home.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about Magic Travel App
home.faq1_a: Yes! You can create a travel plan completely free. No credit card needed to start.
home.faq2_q: How does AI work in travel planning?
home.faq2_a: Our AI analyzes your preferences, budget, stay duration, and activities of interest. Then it searches thousands of options to create a personalized itinerary with top attractions, restaurants, and practical tips.
home.faq3_q: Can I edit the generated plan?
home.faq3_a: Absolutely! You have full control over the plan. You can add, remove, or modify any point in the itinerary. AI gives you a starting point, and you customize it to your needs.
home.faq4_q: What does the travel plan PDF look like?
home.faq4_a: The PDF contains a complete day-by-day itinerary, map with marked points, attraction descriptions, suggested visit times, cost information, and practical tips. Everything in a professional, readable format.
home.faq5_q: Which destinations does the app work for?
home.faq5_a: Magic Travel App works for destinations worldwide. AI has access to information about thousands of cities and regions, so you can plan trips to both popular places and lesser-known spots.
home.faq6_q: How long does it take to create a plan?
home.faq6_a: AI generates a complete travel plan in 1-2 minutes. Including filling out the preferences form, the entire process takes about 5 minutes.
home.final_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of travelers saving time with AI
home.final_cta_features: No credit card • Ready in 5 minutes • Completely free
